hero.title: BUILDING A BRIGHTER FUTURE, HAND-IN-HAND
hero.subtitle: We believe in the power of community. In partnership with villages from Dschang to Cameroon, we're ensuring that every family has the opportunity to thrive through access to healthcare, education, and cultural heritage.

Topabout.title: A vocation born from a dream of social justice
Topabout.paragraph: The Denise Time Mafodom Foundation was born from a vision of boundless human solidarity. We transform lives through compassionate action, from the beating heart of Dschang to the most remote villages of Cameroon.
Topabout.missionText: Igniting hope, empowering lives, and transforming communities through shared humanity. We champion human solidarity by creating pathways of opportunity through transformative education, dynamic cultural exchange, compassionate humanitarian support, and sustainable social development.
Topabout.visionText: A world united by compassion, where every community thrives with dignity and purpose. We envision a future where compassion transcends all geographic, cultural, and economic boundaries. A world where children dream without limits and human potential knows no barriers.

about.label: Know about us
about.title: From the Ground Up: Our Promise to Cameroonian Communities.
about.description: We believe real change begins with a single, crucial step. In villages like Yantou and across Cameroon, a child’s future depends on having a classroom, a mother’s survival depends on a local clinic, and a community's spirit is tied to its heritage. The Fondation Denise Time Mafodom (FDTM) was born from this simple truth. we partner with local leaders and families, providing the essential resources they need to build lasting health, opportunity, and progress

coreValues.title: Our Core Values
coreValues.description: These principles guide every action we take and define who we are as an organization.

impactDirect.title: Direct Impact
impactDirect.text: We focus on projects that bring measurable and immediate change in people's lives, with tangible and verifiable results.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.text: Every donation is tracked and its use is communicated clearly to our partners and donors. Our impact reports are public and detailed.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.text: We create solutions that empower communities to become self-sufficient long-term, with impacts lasting well beyond our interventions.

focusAreas.title: Our Focus Areas
focusAreas.description: Our work unfolds on four essential pillars for comprehensive and sustainable human development.

health.title: Health
health.text: Build and equip health centers to guarantee access to primary care for all, including maternal and child health.

education.title: Education
education.text: Provide scholarships, school supplies, and an environment conducive to learning to unlock each child's potential.

culture.title: Culture
culture.text: Celebrate local heritage and encourage cultural exchanges to strengthen identity and social cohesion.

humanitarianAid.title: Humanitarian Aid
humanitarianAid.text: Respond quickly to provide essential aid to populations in crisis or extreme hardship.

support.label: Donate
support.title: Your Gift, Their Future. See the Direct Impact of Your Donation.
support.description1: Every donation, no matter the size, provides life-changing resources for a family in need.
support.description2: You can be the reason a child recovers from illness, a student receives their first textbook, or a new mother has a safe place to give birth
support.description3: Your generosity writes a new story for a community.
support.description4: From newborns to elders, your kindness creates lasting impact. Join us because every gift births a brighter tomorrow.

stories.title: Stories from the Field
stories.description: Behind every statistic lies a human story, a fulfilled dream, a transformed life.
stories.quote: Before, we had to walk 2 hours to see a doctor. Now, healthcare is at our doorstep. The foundation saved our village.
stories.author: — Marie, resident of Yantou and mother of three children.

joinUs.title: Join Us in making a difference
joinUs.subtitle: You have the power to create lasting change. Whether through your time, your voice, or a donation, your partnership helps build a world where every person has the chance to thrive. Join our mission today.

gallery.title: In Pictures
gallery.description: Discover our projects and the impact of your generosity through these moments captured in the field.
